text:
tadanu prācīnapraṇidhānāvedhād raṃbījajanitaravibimbe hūṃkārapariṇataviśvavajratanmadhyāsīnahūṃkārayoḥ preṅkhanmayūkhaśākhābhir vajraprākārapañjaraśarajālavitānasīmābandhān vidhāyādhaḥ kuliśavasudhāyās tadviśvāśanivinirmitāyā ūrdhvam ekārajaśubhratryasradharmodayāntaḥsarojavaraṭakasthaviśvavajravedyāṃ 
yaṃjātadvipatākadhanurnibha nīlānilamaṇḍalopari raṃkārapariṇataṃ raktaṃ tryasraṃ niryatsaptajvālam analamaṇḍalam ||

mohavajrīṃ sṛjed agnau śaratpuṇḍra samaprabhām |
pītācalaṃ sṛjet savye piśunavajrīṃ ca nairṛte ||

kṣatriyarudhiramaye jagadapagatapāpaṃ snapayasi payasi śamitabhavatāpam |
keśava dhṛtabhṛgupatirūpa jaya jagadīśa hare ||

vahasi vapuṣi viśade vasanaṃ jaladābhaṃ 
halahatibhītimilitayamunābham |
keśava dhṛtahaladhararūpa jaya jagadīśa hare ||

mlecchanivahanidhane kalayasi karavālaṃ 
dhūmaketum iva kim api karālam |
keśava dhṛtakalkiśarīra jaya jagadīśa hare ||
śritakamalākucamaṇḍala dhṛtakuṇḍala e kalitalalitavanamāla jaya jaya deva hare ||

dinamaṇimaṇḍalamaṇḍana bhavakhaṇḍana e 
munijanamānasahaṃsa jaya jaya deva hare ||
kāliyaviṣadharagañjana janarañjana e yadukulanalinadineśa jaya jaya deva hare ||

vākdevatācaritacitritacittasadmā padmāvatīcaraṇacāraṇacakravartī |
śrīvāsudevaratikelikathāsametam etam karoti jayadevakaviḥ prabandham ||
amalakamaladalalocana bhavamocana e tribhuvanabhuvananidhāna jaya jaya deva hare ||
abhinavajaladharasundara dhṛtamandara e śrīmukhacandracakora jaya jaya deva hare ||

padmāpayodharataṭīparirambhalagnakāśmīramudritamuro madhusūdanasya |
vyaktānurāgamiva kheladanaṅgakhedasvedāmbupūramanupūrayatu priyaṃ vaḥ ||

mṛgamadasaurabharabhasavaśaṃvadanavadalamālatamāle |
yuvajanahṛdayavidāraṇa manasijanakharucikiṃśukajāle ||

madanamahīpatikanakadaṇḍarucikeśarakusumavikāśe |
militaśilīmukhapāṭalipaṭalakṛtasmaratūṇavilāse ||

vigalitalajjitajagadavalokanataruṇakaruṇakṛtahāse |
virahinikṛntanakuntamukhākṛtiketakadanturitāśe ||

daravidalitamallīvallicañcatparāgaprakaṭitapaṭavāsair vāsayan kānanāni |
iha hi dahati cetaḥ ketakīgandhabandhuḥ prasaradasamabāṇaprāṇavad gandhavāhaḥ ||

unmīlanmadhugandhalubdhamadhupavyādhūtacūtāṅkurakrīḍatkokilakākalīkalakalair udgīrṇakarṇajvaraḥ |
nīyante pathikaiḥ kathaṃ katham api dhyānāvadhānakṣaṇaprāptaprāṇasamāgamarasollāsair amī vāsarāḥ ||

kāpi vilāsavilolavilocanakhelanajanitamanojam |
dhyāyati mugdhavadhūradhikaṃ madhusūdanavadanasarojam ||

viśveṣāmanurañjanena janayannānandamindīvaraśreṇīśyāmalakomalairupanayannaṅgairanaṅgotsavam |
svacchandaṃ vrajasundarībhirabhitaḥ pratyaṅgamāliṅgitaḥ śṛṅgāraḥ sakhi mūrtimāniva madhau mugdho hariḥ krīḍati ||

vasati daśanaśikhare dharaṇī tava lagnā 
śaśini kalaṅkakaleva nimagnā |
keśava dhṛtaśūkararūpa jaya jagadīśa hare ||

tava karakamalavare nakham adbhutaśṛṅgaṃ 
dalitahiraṇyakaśiputanubhṛṅgam |
keśava dhṛtanaraharirūpa jaya jagadīśa hare ||

ratisukhasamayarasālasayā daramukulitanayanasarojam |
niḥsahanipatitatanulatayā madhusūdanamuditamanojam ||

hastasrastavilāsavaṃśamanṛjubhrūvallimadballavīvṛndotsāridṛgantavīkṣitamatisvedārdragaṇḍasthalam |
māmudvīkṣya vilakṣitaṃ smitasudhāmugdhānanaṃ kānane govindaṃ vrajasundarīgaṇavṛtaṃ paśyāmi hṛṣyāmi ca ||

sakūtasmitamākulākulagaladdhammillam ullāsitabhrūvallīkam alīkadarśitabhujāmūlārdhahastastanam |
gopīnāṃ nibhṛtaṃ nirīkṣya gamitākāṅkṣaściraṃ cintayannantarmugdhamanoharaṃ haratu vaḥ kleśaṃ navaḥ keśavaḥ ||

candrakacārumayūraśikhaṇḍakamaṇḍalavalayitakeśam |
pracurapurandaradhanuranurañjitameduramudirasuveśam ||

gopakadambanitambavatīmukhacumbanalambhitalobham |
bandhujīvamadhurādharapallavamullasitasmitaśobham ||

vipulapulakabhujapallavavalayitaballavayuvatisahasram |
karacaraṇorasi maṇigaṇabhūṣaṇakiraṇavibhinnatamisram ||

jaladapaṭalavaladinduvinindakacandanatilakalalāṭam |
pīnapayodharaparisaramardananirdayahṛdayakapāṭam ||

kaṃsārirapi saṃsāravāsanābandhaśṛṅkhalām |
rādhāmādhāya hṛdaye tatyāja vrajasundarīḥ ||

varṇitaṃ jayadevakena hareridaṃ pravaṇena | 
tindubilvasamudrasambhavarohiṇīramaṇena ||

hṛdi bisalatāhāro nāyaṃ bhujaṅgamanāyakaḥ kuvalayadalaśreṇī kaṇṭhe na sā garaladyutiḥ |
malayajarajo nedaṃ bhasma priyārahite mayi prahara na harabhrāntyānaṅga krudhā kimu dhāvasi ||

pāṇau mā kuru cūtasāyakamamuṃ mā cāpamāropaya kṛīḍānirjitaviśva mūrcchitajanāghātena kiṃ pauruṣam |
tasyā eva mṛgīdṛśo manasijapreṇkhatkatākṣāśugaśreṇījarjaritaṃ manāgapi mano nādyāpi saṃdhukṣate ||

bhrūpallavaṃ dhanurapāṅgataraṅgitāni bāṇā guṇaḥ śravaṇapāliriti smareṇa |
tasyāmanaṅgajayajaṅgamadevatāyāmastrāṇi nirjitajaganti kimarpitāni ||

bhrūcāpe nihitaḥ kaṭākṣaviśikho nirmātu marmavyathāṃ śyāmātmā kuṭilaḥ karotu kabarībhāro 'pi mārodyamam |
mohaṃ tāvadayaṃ ca tanvi tanutāṃ bimbadharo rāgavān sadvṛttaḥ stanamaṇḍalastava kathaṃ prāṇairmama krīḍati ||

tāni sparśasukhāni te ca taralāḥ snigdhā dṛśorvibhramāstadvaktrāmbujasaurabhaṃ sa ca sudhāsyandi girāṃ vakrimā |
sa bimbādharamādhurīti viṣayāsaṅge 'pi cenmānasaṃ tasyāṃ lagnasamādhi hanta virahavyādhiḥ kathaṃ vardhate ||

tiryakkaṇṭhavilolamaulitaralottaṃsasya vamśoccaradgītisthānakṛtāvadhānalalanālakṣair na saṃlakṣitāḥ |
saṃmugdhe madhusūdanasya madhure rādhāmukhendau sudhāsāre kandalitāściraṃ dadatu vaḥ kṣemaṃ kaṭākṣormayaḥ ||

cintayāmi tadānanaṃ kuṭilabhru kopabhareṇa |
śonapadmamivopari bhramatākulaṃ bhramareṇa ||

āvāso vipināyate priyasakhīmālāpi jālāyate tāpo 'pi śvasitena dāvadahanajvālakalāpāyate |
sāpi tvadviraheṇa hanta hariṇīrūpāyate hā kathaṃ kandarpo 'pi yamāyate viracayan śārdūlavikrīḍitam ||

stanavinihitamapi hāramudāram |
sā manute kṛśātanuriva bhāram ||
rādhikā virahe tava keśava ||

sarasamasṛṇamapi malayajapaṅkam |
paśyati viṣamiva vapuṣi saśaṅkam ||

śvasitapavanamanupamapariṇāham |
madanadahanamiva vahati sadāham ||

diśi diśi kirati sajalakaṇajālam |
nayananalinamiva vigalitanālam ||

tyajati na pāṇitalena kapolam |
bālaśaśinam iva sāyamalolam ||

nayanaviṣayamapi kiśalayatalpaṃ |
kalayati vihitahutāśavikalpam ||

nindati candanamindukiraṇamanu vindati khedamadhīram |
vyālanilayamilanena garalamiva kalayati malayasamīram ||
sā virahe tava dīnā |
mādhava manasijaviśikhabhayādiva bhāvanayā tvayi līnā ||

aviralanipatitamadanaśarādiva bhavadavanāya vīśālam |
svahṛdayamarmaṇi varma karoti sajalanalinīdalajālam ||

kusumaviśikhaśaratalpam analpavilāsakalākamaṇīyam |
vratamiva tava parirambhasukhāya karoti kusumaśayanīyam ||

vahati ca galitavilocanajaladhāramānanakamalamudāram |
vidhumiva vikaṭavidhuntudadantadalanagalitāmṛtadhāram ||

vilikhati rahasi kuraṅgamadena bhavantamasamaśarabhūtam |
praṇamati makaramadho vinidhāya kare ca śaraṃ navacūtam ||

pratipadamidam api nigadati mādhava tava caraṇe patitāham |
tvayi vimukhe mayi sapadi sudhānidhirapi tanute tanudāham ||

tadvat saṃsārakaṃ ratnaṃ pañcakāmagunaiḥ yutaṃ |
aviśuddhaṃ viṣatāṃ yāti viśuddhaṃ pīyūṣavad bhavet ||

pūrṇavyākaraṇāvagāhanaśuciḥ sattarkamūlonmiṣatprajñākalpalatāvivekagusumairabhyarcya hṛddevatām |
pīyūṣāsavasārasundaramahāsāhityasauhityabhāgviśrāmyāmyahamīśvarādvayakathākāntās ||

kathāprasaṅgena janairudāhṛtādanusmṛtākhaṇḍalasūnuvikramaḥ |
tavābhidhānād vyathate natānanaḥ suduḥsahānmantrapadādivoragaḥ ||

vidhisamayaniyogād dīptisaṃhārajihmaṃ śithiladaśamagādhe magnamāpatpayodhau |
riputimiramudasyodīyamānaṃ dinādau dinakṛtamiva lakṣmīstvāṃ samabhyetu bhūyaḥ ||

vyadhita yāṃ himacandanamaṇḍitām avanato rasikaḥ śiśiraḥ svayam |
viśadakundanibhāt pramadodayād iha satī hasatīva mahī sma sā ||

caturmukhamukhāmbhojavanahaṃsavadhūrmama |
mānase ramatāṃ dīrghaṃ sarvaśuklā sarasvatī ||

chandovicityāṃ sakalastatprabandho nidarśitaḥ |
sā vidyā naurvivikṣūṇāṃ gambhīraṃ kāvyasāgaram ||

mahārāṣṭrāśrayāṃ bhāṣāṃ prakṛṣṭaṃ prākṛtaṃ viduḥ |
sāgaraḥ sūktiratnānāṃ setubandhādi yanmayam ||

prasādavat prasiddhārthamindorindīvaradyuti |
lakṣma lakṣmīṃ tanotīti pratītisubhagaṃ vacaḥ ||

vyutpannamiti gauḍīyairnātirūḍhamapīṣyate |
yathānatyarjunābjanmasadṛkṣāṅko balakṣaguḥ ||

ādirājayaśobimbamādarśaṃ prāpya vāṅmayam |
teṣāmasaṃnidhāne 'pi na svayaṃ paśya naśyati ||

madhuraṃ rasavadvāci vastunyapi rasasthitiḥ |
yena mādhyanti dhīmanto madhuneva madhuvratāḥ ||

candre śaranniśottaṃse kundastavakavibhrame |
indranīlanibhaṃ lakṣma saṃdadhāty anilaḥ śriyam ||

ityanuprāsamicchanti nātidūrāntaraśrutim |
na tu rāmāmukhāmbhojasadṛśaścandramā iti ||

gaurgauḥ kāmadughā samyakprayuktā smaryate budhaiḥ |
duṣprayuktā punargotvaṃ prayoktuḥ saiva śaṃsati ||

astamastakaparyastasamastārkāṃśusaṃstarā |
pīnastanasthitātāmrakamravastreva vāruṇī ||

payodharataṭotsaṅgalagnasaṃdhyātapāṃśukā |
kasya kāmāturaṃ ceto vāruṇī na kariṣyati ||

devadhiṣṇyam ivārādhyam adyaprabhṛti no gṛham |
yuṣmatpādarajaḥpāta- dhautaniḥśeṣakilbiṣam ||

kumudāni nimīlāni kamalānyunmiṣanti ca |
iti netrakriyādhyāsāllabdhā tadvācinī śrutiḥ ||

gurugarbhabharaklāntāḥ stanantyo meghapaṅktayaḥ |
acalādhityakotsaṅgamimāḥ samadhiśerate ||

ambhoruhamivātāmraṃ mugdhe karatalaṃ tava |
iti dharmopamā sākṣāt tulyadharmapradarśanāt ||

rājīvamiva te vaktraṃ netre nīlotpale iva |
iyaṃ pratīyamānaikadharmā vastūpamaiva sā ||

tavānanam ivonnidram aravindam abhūd iti |
sā prasiddhiviparyāsād viparyāsopameṣyate ||

tavānanam ivāmbhojam ambojam iva te mukham |
ity anyo 'nyopamā sāyam anyo 'nyotkarṣaśaṃsinī ||

tvanmukhaṃ kamalenaiva tulyaṃ nānyena kenacit |
ityanyasāmyavyāvṛtter iyaṃ sā niyamopamā ||

padmaṃ tāvattavānveti mukhamanyacca tādṛśam |
asti cedastu tatkārītyasāvaniyamopamā ||

samuccayopamāpyasti na kāntyaiva mukhaṃ tava |
hlādanākhyena cānveti karmaṇendumitīdṛśī ||

tvayyeva tvanmukhaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ dṛśyate divi candramāḥ |
iyatyeva bhidā nānyety asāv atiśayopamā ||

mayyevāsyā mukhaśrīrityalamindorvikatthanaiḥ |
padme 'pi sā yadastyevetyasāvutprekṣitopamā ||

yadi kiṃcid bhavet padmaṃ subhru vibhrāntalocanam |
tatte mukhaśriyaṃ dhattāmityasāvadbhutopamā ||

śaśītyutprekṣya tanvaṅgi tvanmukhaṃ tvanmukhāśayā |
indumapy anudhāvāmītyeṣā mohopamā smṛtā ||

kiṃ padmamantarbhrāntāli kiṃ te lolekṣaṇaṃ mukham |
mama dolāyate cittamitīyaṃ saṃśayopamā ||

na padmasyendunigrāhyasyendulajjākarī dyutiḥ |
atas tvanmukham evedam ity asau nirṇayopamā ||

śiśirāṃśupratispardhi śrīmatsurabhigandhi ca |
ambhojamiva te vaktramiti śleṣopamā smṛtā ||

sarūpaśabdavācyatvāt sā samānopamā yathā |
bālevodyānamāleyaṃ sālakānanaśobhinī ||

padmaṃ bahurajaścandraḥ kṣayī tābhyāṃ tavānanam |
samānamapi sotsekamiti nindopamā smṛtā ||

brahmaṇo 'pyudbhavaḥ padmaṃ candraḥ śaṃbhuśirodhṛtaḥ |
tau tulyau tvanmukheneti sā praśaṃsopamocyate ||

candreṇa tvanmukhaṃ tulyamityācikhyāsu me manaḥ |
sa guṇo vāstu doṣo vetyācikhyāsopamāṃ viduḥ ||

śatapattraṃ śaraccandras tvadānanamiti trayam |
parasparavirodhīti sā virodhopamā matā ||

na jātu śaktirindos te mukhena pratigarjitum |
kalaṅkino jaḍasyeti pratiṣedhopamaiva sā ||

mṛgekṣaṇāṅkaṃ te vaktram mṛgeṇaivāṅkitaḥ śaśī |
tathāpi sama evāsau notkarṣīti caṭūpamā ||

na padmaṃ mukhamevedaṃ na bhṛṅgau cakṣuṣī ime |
iti vispaṣṭasādṛśyāttattvākhyānopamaiva sā ||

candrāravindayoḥ kāntimatikramyamukhaṃ tava |
ātmanaivābhavattulyamityasādhāraṇopamā ||

sarvapadmaprabhāsāraḥ samāhṛta iva kvacit |
tvadānanaṃ vibhātīti tāmabhūtopamāṃ viduḥ ||

candrabimbādiva viṣaṃ candanādiva pāvakaḥ |
paruṣā vāgito vaktrādityasaṃbhāvitopamā ||

candanodakacandrāṃśucandrakāntādiśītalaḥ |
sparśas tavetyatiśayaṃ bodhayantī bahūpamā ||

candrabimbād ivotkīrṇaṃ padmagarbhād ivoddhṛtam |
tava tanvaṅgi vadanam ity asau vikriyopamā ||

pūṣṇyātapa ivāhnīva pūṣā vyomnīva vāsaraḥ |
vikramastvayyadhāllakṣmīmiti mālopamā matā ||

tvadānanamadhīrākṣamāvirdaśanadīdhiti |
bhramadbhṛṅgamivālakṣyakesaraṃ bhāti paṅkajam ||

nalinyā iva tanvaṅgyās tasyāḥ padmamivānanam |
mayā madhuvrateneva pāyaṃ pāyamaramyata ||

naiko 'pi tvādṛśo 'dyāpi jāyamāneṣu rājasu |
nanu dvitīyo nāstyeva pārijātasya pādapaḥ ||

divo jāgarti rakṣāyai pulomārir bhuvo bhavān |
asurās tena hanyante sāvalepās tvayā nṛpāḥ ||

kāntyā candramasaṃ dhāmnā sūryaṃ dhairyeṇa cārṇavam |
rājann anukaroṣīti saiṣā hetūpamā matā ||

strīva gacchati ṣaṇḍho 'yaṃ vakty eṣā strī pumān iva |
prāṇā iva priyo 'yam me vidyā dhanam ivārjitam ||

bhavān iva mahīpāla devarājo virājate |
alam aṃśumataḥ kakṣām āroḍhuṃ tejasā nṛpaḥ ||

haṃsīva dhavalaścandraḥ sarāṃsīvāmalaṃ nabhaḥ |
bhartṛbhakto bhaṭaḥ śveva khadyoto bhāti bhānuvat ||

samāsaśca bahuvrīhiḥ śaśāṅkavadanādiṣu |
spardhate jayati dveṣṭi druhyati pratigarjati ||

upamaiva tirobhūtabhedā rūpakam ucyate |
yathā bāhulatā pāṇipadmaṃ caraṇapallavaḥ ||

aṅgulyaḥ pallavāny āsan kusumāni nakhārciṣaḥ |
bāhū late vasantaśrīs tvaṃ naḥ pratyakṣacāriṇī ||

ity etad asamastākhyaṃ samastaṃ pūrvarūpakam |
smitaṃ mukhendor jyotsneti samastavyastarūpakam ||

tāmrāṅgulidalaśreṇi nakhadīdhitikesaram |
dhriyate mūrdhni bhūpālairbhavaccaraṇapaṅkajam ||

akasmādeva te caṇḍi sphuritādharapallavam |
mukhaṃ muktāruco dhatte gharmāmbhaḥkaṇamañjarīḥ ||

valgitabhru galadgharmajalamālohitekṣaṇam |
vivṛṇāti madāvasthāmidamvadanapaṅkajam ||

madapāṭalagaṇḍena raktanetrotpalena te |
mukhena mugdhaḥ so 'py eṣa jano rāgamayaḥ kṛtaḥ ||

smitapuṣpojjvalaṃ lolanetrabhṛṅgam idaṃ mukham |
iti puṣpadvirephāṇāṃ saṃgatyā yuktarūpakam ||

idam ārdrasmitajyotsnaṃ snigdhanetrotpalaṃ mukham |
iti jyotsnotpalāyogād ayuktaṃ nāma rūpakam ||

madaraktakapolena manmathas tvanmukhendunā |
nartitabhrūlatenālaṃ mardituṃ bhuvanatrayam ||

haripādaḥ śirolagnajahnukanyājalāṃśukaḥ |
jayaty asuraniḥśaṅkasurānandotsavadhvajaḥ ||

na mīlayati padmāni na nabho 'py avagāhate |
tvanmukhendur mamāsūnāṃ haraṇāyaiva kalpate ||

gāmbhīryeṇa samudro 'si gauraveṇāsi parvataḥ |
kāmadatvācca lokānāmasitvaṃ kalpapādapaḥ ||

rājahaṃsopabhogārthaṃ bhramaraprārthyasaurabham |
sakhi vaktrāmbujamidaṃ taveti śliṣṭarūpakam ||

ayam ālohitacchāyo madane mukhacandramāḥ |
saṃnaddhodayarāgasya candrasya pratigarjati ||

candramāḥ pīyate devairmayā tvanmukhacandramāḥ |
asamagro 'py asau śaśvadayamāpūrṇamaṇḍalaḥ ||

mukhacandrasya candratvamitthamanyopatāpinaḥ |
na te sundari saṃvādītyetadākṣeparūpakam ||

mukhendurapi te caṇḍi māṃ nirdahati nirdayam |
bhāgyadoṣānmamaiveti tatsamādhānarūpakam ||

mukhapaṅkajaraṅge 'smin bhrūlatānartakī tava |
līlānṛtyaṃ karotīti ramyaṃ rūpakarūpakam // 2.93 //

naitanmukhamidaṃ padmaṃ na netre bhramarāvimau |
etāni kesarāṇyeva naitā dantārciṣastava ||

asāvudayamārūḍhaḥ kāntimān raktamaṇḍalaḥ |
rājā harati lokasya hṛdayaṃ mṛdubhiḥ karaiḥ ||

doṣākareṇa samvaghnannakṣatrapathavartinā |
rājñā pradoṣo māmityamapriyaṃ kiṃ na bādhate ||

svabhāvamadhurāḥ snigdhāḥ śaṃsantyo rāgamulbaṇam |
dṛśo dūtyaśca karṣanti kāntābhiḥ preṣitāḥ priyam ||

padmānāmeva daṇḍeṣu kaṇṭakastvayi rakṣati |
athavā dṛśyate rāgimithunāliṅganeṣvapi ||

merumahīdharabhuva iva kimpuruṣasahasrasevitanitambāḥ |
nītaya iva bhūmibhṛtāṃ suparihṛtānarthasaṃyogāḥ ||

bahumitrakaravidāraṇalabdhābhyudayāḥ saroruhiṇya iva |
ḍākinya iva ca raktavyākarṣaṇakauśalopetāḥ ||

pratipuruṣaṃ sannihitāḥ kṛtyaparā vividhavikaraṇopacitāḥ |
bahulārthagrāhiṇyaḥ prakṛtaya iva durgrahā gaṇikāḥ ||

ātmānaṃ rathinaṃ viddhi śarīraṃ rathameva tu | 
buddhiṃ tu sārathiṃ viddhi manaḥ pragrahameva ca ||

yathā kāṣṭhaṃ ca kāṣṭhaṃ ca sameyātāṃ mahodadhau |
sametya ca vyatīyātāṃ/vyapeyātāṃ tadvadbhūtasamāgamaḥ ||
trivedī ca tasya cakṣur iti gauṇo vādaḥ, asandigdhāviparītaspaṣṭavedārthaprakāśakatvāt | divyaṃ cātīndriyārthagocaratvāt |

bhagnasphuṭitacaityādāv iṣṭakādipradānataḥ |
syād alpāyuḥ sudīrghāyuḥ paiṇḍapātikabhikṣuvat ||

chandakabhikṣayopāttair dravyaiḥ saṃghasya bhojanāt |
saptāhāyuś cirāyuḥ syād dharmāśokanarendravat ||

abhinavabodhādityadyutivikasitahṛtsarojānme |
rasayata sarasāḥ parimalamasārasaṃsāravāsanāśāntyai ||

bhāvanābalataḥ sarvam indriyajñānam āgatam |
indriyajñānarūpatvāt svapnavijñānarūpavat ||

kiṃbhūtā | nirhrāsātiśayadharmāṇaḥ |
yathā jvālādayo bādhakasya udakāder utkarṣāpakarṣe sati nirhrāsātiśayadharmāṇo yathākramam udakādy-abhibhava-utkarṣaṃ sādhayanti tadvat ||

vṛṣṭivicchedajātena tānavenāsamāptinā |
prapedire jaladharāstasya sabrahmacāritām ||

yayau virahasaṃvartaḥ padminīrājahaṃsayoḥ |
apāraduḥkhārṇavayorna sītārāmabhadrayoḥ ||

śaśāma vṛṣṭir meghānām utsaṅge tasya bhūbhṛtaḥ |
virarāma na rāmasya dhārāsantatir aśruṇaḥ ||

jātaṃ vibhātamamalaṃ paśya prāvṛṇṇiśā gatā |
utsāhakamalasyāyaṃ vikāsāvasarastava ||

sudūronnataparyantāstīryante saṅkramairiva |
analpagādhāḥ saritas tarubhiḥ pūrapātitaiḥ ||

āviṣkṛtaviśuddhibhyāṃ nadyaḥ sumahilā iva |
kulābhyāmiva kūlābhyāmāpatsvapi cakāsati ||

itastataḥ pariṇatiṃ bheje barhiṇakūjitam |
hā priye rājaputrīti na rāmaparidevitam ||

mṛgāḥ samprati śāleyaṃ sampannaṃ sampatantyamī |
sāketamadhitiṣṭhantamarthinastvāmivonmukhāḥ ||

kāpyabhikhyā virajasoḥ sūryācandramasorabhūt |
dāśarathyostathaivāsīdayogopahatā ruciḥ ||

bhadraṃ bhādrapadacchedacchinnābhrājinarajjave |
tubhyaṃ puruṣanāgāya nirvighnatarase 'dhunā ||

nirmalendu nabho reje vikacābjaṃ babhau saraḥ |
paraṃ paryaśruvadanau mamlaturbhrātarāvubhau ||

śālipiṅgamahīpṛṣṭhaspardhayeva bhaviṣyati |
raṃhasviharisaṃghātasampātakapilaṃ nabhaḥ ||

teṣāmāroṣarucirairacirānmukhamaṇḍalaiḥ |
drakṣyate taruṇādityaśatacchannamivāmbaram ||

vāgarthāv iva saṃpṛktau vāgarthapratipattaye |
jagataḥ pitarau vande pārvatīparameśvarau ||

kāpyabhikhyā tayorāsīdvrajatoḥ śuddhaveśayoḥ |
himanirmuktayoryoge citrācandramasoriva ||

lakṣyate sma tadanantaraṃ ravirbaddhabhīmapariveṣamaṇḍalaḥ |
vainateyaśamitasya bhogino bhogaveṣṭita iva cyuto maṇiḥ ||

śyenapakṣaparidhūsarālakā bhūrajaḥsarudhirārdravāsasaḥ |
aṅganā iva rajasvalā diśo no babhūvuravalokanakṣamāḥ ||

yatipārthivaliṅgadhāriṇau dadṛśāte raghurāghavau janaiḥ |
apavargamahodayārthayorbhuvamaṃśāviva dharmayorgatau ||

anurañjayituṃ prajāḥ prabhur vyavahārāsanam ādade navaḥ |
aparaḥ śuciviṣṭarāśrayaḥ paricetuṃ yatate sma dhāraṇāḥ ||

anayatprabhuśaktisaṁpadā vaśameko nṛpatīnanantarān|
aparaḥ praṇidhānayogyayā marutaḥ pañca śarīragocarān ||

akarodacireśvaraḥ kṣitau dviṣadārambhaphalāni bhasmasāt|
itaro dahane svakarmaṇām vavṛte jñānamayena vahninā ||

na navaḥ prabhurāphalodayāt-sthirakarmā virarāma karmaṇaḥ|
na ca yogavidhernavetaraḥ sthiradhīrāparamātmadarśanāt || 8.22

balamārtabhayopaśāntaye viduṣām satkṛtaye bahu śrutam|
vasu tasya vibhorna kevalam guṇavattāpi paraprayojanā ||

sa kadācidavekṣitaprajaḥ saha devyā vijahāra suprajāḥ|
nagaropavane śacīsakho marutām pālayiteva nandane ||

bhramaraiḥ kusumānusāribhiḥ parikīrṇā parivādinī muneḥ|
dadṛśe pavanāpalepajam sṛjatī bāṣpamivāñjanāvilam ||

sa babhūva durāsado 'ribhirguruṇātharvavidā kṛtakriyaḥ |
pavanāgnisamāgamo hyayaṃ sahitaṃ brahma yadastratejasā ||

pratiyojayitavyavallakīsamavasthāmatha sattvasaṃplavāt |
sa nināya nitāntavatsalaḥ parigṛhyocitamaṅkamaṅganām ||

patiraṅkaniṣaṇṇayā tayā karaṇāpāyavibhinnavarṇayā |
samalakṣyata bibhradāvilām mṛgalekhāmuṣasīva candramāḥ ||

vilalāpa sa bāṣpagadgadam sahajāmapyapahāya dhīratām |
abhitaptamayo'pi mārdavam bhajate kaiva kathā śarīriṣu ||

kusumotkhacitānvalībhṛtaścalayanbhṛṅgarucastavālakān|
karabhoru karoti mārutastvadupāvartanaśaṅki me manaḥ ||

idamucchvasitālakam mukham tava viśrāntakatham dunoti mām|
niśi suptamivaikapaṅkajam viratābhyantaraṣaṭpadasvanam ||

śaśinam punareti śarvarī dayitā dvandvacaram patatriṇam|
iti tau virahāntarakṣamau kathamatyantagatā na mām daheḥ ||

smarateva saśabdanūpuram caraṇānugrahamanyadurlabham |
amunā kusumāśruvarṣiṇā tvamaśokena sugātri śocyase ||

tava niḥśvasitānukāribhirbakulairardhacitām samam mayā|
asamāpya vilāsamekhalām kimidam kinnarakaṇṭhi supyate ||

samaduḥkhasukhaḥ sakhījanaḥ pratipaccandranibho'yamātmajaḥ|
ahamekarasastathāpi te vyavasāyaḥ pratipattiniṣṭhuraḥ ||

vilapanniti kosalādhipaḥ karuṇārthagrathitam priyām prati|
akarotpṛthivīruhānapi srutaśākhārasabāṣpadūṣitān ||

sa viveśa purīm tayā vinā kṣaṇadāpāyaśaśāṅkadarśanaḥ|
parivāhamivāvalokayansvaśucaḥ pauravadhūmukhāśruṣu ||

paruṣo na na bhūyasā mṛduḥ pavamānaḥ pṛthivīruhāniva |
sa puraskṛtamadhyamakramo namayāmāsa nṛpānanuddharan ||

sa ca sarvaguṇopetaḥ kausalyānandavardhanaḥ | 
samudra iva gāmbhīrye dhairyeṇa himavān iva ||

viṣṇunā sadṛśo vīrye somavat priyadarśanaḥ | 
kālāgnisadṛśaḥ krodhe kṣamayā pṛthivīsamaḥ ||

kavīnāṃ mānasaṃ naumi taranti pratibhāmbhasi |
yatra haṃsavayāṃsīva bhuvanāni caturdaśa ||

jayanti kavayaḥ ke 'pi sūktair mantrair iva drutam |
tāṃs tāṃś cidrūpacitteṣu rasān āveśayanti ye ||

sitamarīcirucāmiva saṃcayaṃ hasitarāśimiva tripuradruhaḥ |
dhanapateryaśasāmiva maṇḍalaṃ samudayaṃ śaradambumucāmiva ||

āmodārthī yathā bhṛṅgaḥ puṣpātpuṣpāntaraṃ vrajet | 
vijñānārthī tathā śiṣyo gurorgurvantaraṃ vrajet ||

etasmādyo māyopamādisvaviracitasaṃsārasūkṣmaprabandhavāsanāticañcalānavagrāhitirobhūtacittasantatipravṛttiskhaladavasthākālākalitābāhyavinihitasakalakalpanāpaṭalapaṭojjvalaḥ sukhātmāśuddhasattvasvabhāvo jagatprabhuḥ savāyurasau retobindubhiḥ sārdhaṃ pariprāptaṛtuyoṣito nābheradho ’dhomukhāṣṭadalāruṇavikasitakamalodaragalitaśeṣaśoṇitamāliṅgati |
tadanantaraṃ ca tatra kamalamanumukulitamutpadyate |
tatra ca dve api raktaretasyārambhake nijaprakṛtike kṣīrasalilamiva miśrībhūya piṇḍākāratvamabhavat |

namaste sarvalokānāṃ jananīm abjasambhavām | 
śriyamunnidrapadmākṣīṃ viṣṇorvakṣaḥsthalasthitām ||

padmālayāṃ padmakarāṃ padmapattranibhekṣaṇām | 
vande padmamukhīṃ devīṃ padmanābhapriyāmaham ||

vitīrṇaśikṣā iva hṛtpadasthasarasvatīvāhanarājahaṃsauḥ |
ye kṣīranīrapravibhāgadakṣā vivekinaste kavayo jayanti ||

avadyajambālagaveṣaṇāya kṛtodyamānāṃ khalasairibhāṇām |
kavīndravāṅnirjaranirjhariṇyāṃ saṃjāyate vyarthamanorathatvam ||

kalaṅkaśūnyāpi rasapravāhamapi sravantī vibudhopajīvyam 
vāṇī kimeṇāṅkakaleva dhatte ṭaṅkaṃ vinā vakrimavibhrameṇa ||

dṛḍhaprarūḍhā śatapantrayoneḥ kiyatyaho sādhujane 'nukampā |
yo 'dyāpi vidyānavapakṣasaṅgaṃ khalaplavaṃgasya na nirmimīte ||

nigūḍhasaujanyabhṛto 'pi kecitpāruṣyamāhāryamanuplavante |
antaḥ sudhābandhuraso 'pi dhatte bahirvapuḥ karkaśamikṣukāṇḍaḥ ||

kiyadbatāyaṃ kalikālanāmā prakampahetuḥ prathito himartuḥ |
khalinyakhaṇḍā rajanīva yasminsādhordinasyeva daridramāyuḥ ||

meṇṭhe svardviradādhirohiṇi vaśaṃ yāte subandhau vidheḥ śānte hanta ca bhāravau vighaṭite bāṇe viṣādaspṛśaḥ |
vāgdevyā viramantu mantuvidhurā drāgdṛṣṭayaśceṣṭate śiṣṭaḥ kaścana sa prasādayati tāṃ yadvāṇisadvāṇinī ||

śaithilyaspṛśi saṃśayāvahapade kṣodāsahiṣṇau kaveḥ svairaṃ tatra sarasvatī niviśate kiṃ kāvyajīrṇaukasi |
yacchāstrakramaśilpakārubhiralaṃbhūṣṇuprakarṣaiḥ parairnyastābhiḥ kathamapyupaskṛtivacaḥsthūṇābhiruttabhyate ||

tānyartharatnāni na santi yeṣāṃ suvarṇasaṃghena ca ye na pūrṇāḥ |
te rītimātreṇa daridrakalpā yāntīśvaratvaṃ hi kathaṃ kavīnām ||

uddharatyandhatamasād viśvamānandavarṣiṇī |
paripūrṇā jayatyekā devī ciccandracandrikā ||

ātmā mama bhavadbhaktisudhāpānayuvā 'pi san |
lokayātrārajorāgātpalitairiva dhūsaraḥ ||

manasi vacasi kāye puṇyapīyūṣapūrṇās tribhuvanam upakāraśreṇibhiḥ prīṇayantaḥ |
paraguṇaparamāṇūn parvatīkṛtya nityaṃ nijahṛdi vikasantaḥ santi santaḥ kiyantaḥ ||

tato dhanuḥ puṣpamayaṃ gṛhītvā śarāñ jaganmohakarāṃś ca pañca |
so 'śvattamūlaṃ sasuto 'bhyagacchad asvāsthyakārī manasaḥ prajānām ||

atha bhagavān vajrasattvaḥ kṛṣṇācalasamādhiṃ samāpadyedamudājahāra |
bhāvābhāvavinirmuktaścaturānandaikatatparaḥ |
niṣprapañcasvarūpo 'haṃ sarvasaṃkalpavarjitaḥ ||

māṃ na jānanti ye mūḍhāḥ sarvapumvapuṣi sthitam |
teṣām ahaṃ hitārthāya pañcākāreṇa saṃsthitaḥ ||

atha bhagavatī vajradhātvīśvarī dveṣavajrīsamādhiṃ samāpadyedamudājahāra |
śūnyatākaruṇābhinnā divyakāmasukhasthitā |
sarvakalpavihīnāhaṃ niṣprapañcā nirākulā ||

māṃ na jānanti yā nāryaḥ sarvastrīdehasaṃsthitām |
tāsāmahaṃ hitārthāya pañcākāreṇa saṃsthitā ||

atha bhagavān kṛṣṇācalo gāḍhena bhagavatīṃ dveṣavajrīṃ cumbayitvā samālingya cāmantrayate sma |
devi devi mahāramyaṃ rahasyaṃ cātidurlabham |
sārāt sārataraṃ śreṣṭhaṃ sarvabuddhaiḥ subhāṣitam ||

aprakāśyam idaṃ tantram adṛṣṭamaṇḍalasya hi |
nānyamaṇḍalapraviṣṭasya tantrarājaṃ tu darśayet ||

maṇḍale caṇḍaroṣasya praviṣṭo yaḥ samāhitaḥ |
śraddhāyatnaparaś caṇḍe tasya tantraṃ tu deśayet ||

maṇḍalasya kiyan mānaṃ vartanīyaṃ ca kena hi |
likhitavyaṃ ca tathā tatra madhye kiṃ brūhi me prabho ||

candrasūryoparisthaṃ tu sarvacihnaṃ prakalpayet । 
rajomaṇḍalam idaṃ proktaṃ mayā lokārthasādhane ||

athavā maṇḍalaṃ kuryāt paṭarūpeṇa sulikhitam |
pūrvavat maṇḍalaṃ likhyaṃ madhye kṛṣṇācalaṃ likhet ||

saṃlikhed uttare śyāmācalaṃ vahnau mohavajrīm । 
śvetāṃ nairṛte pītāṃ piśunavajrīṃ samālikhet ||

vāyavye lohitāṃ devīṃ rāgavajrīṃ samālikhet |
aiśāne īrṣyāvajrīṃ śyāmāṃ likhed vai paṭamaṇḍalam ||

yasya tasyaiva cūrṇena nānāvarṇakṛtena ca |
caturaśrañ caturdvāraṃ catustoraṇābhūṣitam ||

pakṣaṃ cāpi tathā vedīhārārdhahārapaṭṭikām | 
mūlasūtrabahistasyāstu ardhenaiva rajobhuvam ||

navamaṃ madhyame tasya madhye khaḍgaṃ sunīlakam |
vajreṇāṅkitaṃ taṃ ca vajrakarttikapālayutam ||

janmakoṭisahasreṣu khaḍgavyagrakarā narāḥ |
sarvāṅgacchedakā bhonti śiraśchedaikatatparāḥ | 
bhaviṣyaṃti tavāpy evaṃ samayaṃ yadi bhetsyasi ||

buddhaṃ gacchāmi śaraṇaṃ yāvad ābodhimaṇḍataḥ |
dharmaṃ gacchāmi śaraṇaṃ saṃghaṃ cāvetyaśraddhayā ||

pramādāyatanaṃ madyaṃ na pāsyāmi kadācana | 
nṛtyagītavibhūṣāṃ ca varjayiṣyāmi sotsavām |
uccaiḥśayyāṃ mahāśayyāṃ vikāle ’pi ca bhojanam ||

hanyāt khaḍgena cākṣobhyaṃ pitaraṃ paścāt prabhakṣayet |
māmakyāpi tatas taṃ ca bhakṣitaṃ vai prakalpayet ||

khaḍgograkaraṃ savye vāme pāśasamanvitam |
tarjanyā tarjayantaṃ ca daṃṣṭroṣṭhaṃ tu nipīditam ||

raktācalaṃ sṛjet pṛṣṭhe raktāṃ ca rāgavajrikām |
vāyavye cottare śyāmācalaṃ śyāmāṃ īśānake ||

prathamaṃ bhāvayen maitrīṃ dvitīye karuṇāṃ vibhāvayet |
tṛtīye bhāvayen muditām upekṣāṃ sarvaśeṣataḥ ||

kāmayet piśunavajrīṃ tu kṛtvā pītācalatmakam |
hatvā raktācalaṃ tadvat kāmayed rāgavajrikām ||

tato hṛdi bhāvayed bījaṃ padmacandraraviṣṭhitam |
raśmibhiḥ purato dhyāyān niṣpannaṃ caṇḍaroṣaṇam ||

pītavarṇā tu yā nārī piśunavajrīṃ vibhāvayet |
raktagaurā tu yā nārī rāgavajrīṃ vibhāvayet ||

kṛṣṇo hi māraṇe dveṣe śvetaḥ śāntau matāvapi |
pītaḥ stambhane puṣṭau vaśyākṛṣṭe tu lohitaḥ ||

śitakanyāṃ śitātmā tu pītakanyāṃ supītakaḥ |
rakto hi raktakanyāṃ tu śyāmakanyāṃ tu śyāmakaḥ ||

yāṃ tām athavā gṛhya yattadā bhāvanāparaḥ |
kāmayet sthiracittena yathā ko 'pi na budhyate ||

yāvadicchaṃ pibet mūtraṃ tāsām arpya bhage mukham |
gudapadme cārpya vai viṣṭhāṃ yāvadicchaṃ prabhakṣayet ||

triśaraṇaṃ gamanaṃ kuryād yācanādhyeṣaṇām api |
ātmānaṃ ca tato dattvā puṇyaṃ ca pariṇāmayet ||

pibākṣobhyajalaṃ putra sapitrā dāsako bhava |
tava gosvāminī cāhaṃ mātā rājakūlīty api ||

madīyaṃ caraṇaṃ gaccha śaraṇaṃ vatsa nirantaram |
mayā saṃvardhito yasmāt tvamānarghyamupāgataḥ ||

āstāṃ tāvatsvajanaṃ parajanamapi puṣṇāti bhikṣayā |
sā ced evaṃrūpā nānyathā strī vajrayoginyāḥ ||

pañcaiva viṣayāḥ strīṇāṃ divyarūpeṇa saṃsthitāḥ |
tām udvāhitāṃ kṛtvā sukhaṃ bhuñjanti mānavaḥ ||

mātaraṃ duhitaraṃ cāpi bhaginīṃ bhāgineyikām |
anyāṃ ca jñātinīṃ sarvāṃ ḍombinīṃ brāhmanīṃ tathā ||

kuryātsukhodayabandhaṃ bandhaṃ ca dolācālanam |
bandhaṃ jānugrahaṃ caiva bandhaṃ cāpyūrumardanam ||

meghairmeduramambaraṃ vanabhuvaḥ śyāmāstamāladrumairnaktam bhīrurayam tvameva tadimam rādhe gṛhaṃ prāpaya |
ittham nandanideśataścalitayoḥ pratyadhvakuñjadrumaṃ rādhāmādhavayorjayanti yamunākūle rahaḥkelayaḥ ||

vitarasi dikṣu raṇe dikpatikamanīyaṃ daśamukhamaulibaliṃ ramaṇīyam |
keśava dhṛtaraghupatirūpa jaya jagadīśa hare ||

nindasi yajñavidherahaha śrutijātaṃ sadayahṛdaya darśitapaśughātam |
keśava dhṛtabuddhaśarīra jaya jagadīśa hare ||

śrījayadevakaveridamuditamudāraṃ śṛṇu sukhadaṃ śubhadaṃ bhavasāram |
keśava dhṛtadaśavidharūpa jaya jagadīśa hare ||

vedānuddharate jagannivahate bhūgolamudbibhrate daityaṃ dārayate baliṃ chalayate kṣatrakṣayaṃ kurvate |
paulastyaṃ jayate halaṃ kalayate kāruṇyamātanvate mlecchān mūrcchayate daśākṛtikṛte kṛṣṇāya tubhyaṃ namaḥ ||
madhumuranarakavināśana garuḍāsana e surakulakelinidāna jaya jaya deva hare ||
janakasutākṛtabhūṣaṇa jitadūṣaṇa e samaraśamitadaśakaṇṭha jaya jaya deva hare ||
śrījayadevakaveridaṃ kurute mudam e maṅgalamujjvalagītaṃ jaya jaya deva hare ||

vasante vāsantīkusumasukumārairavayavairbhramantīṃ kāntāre bahuvihitakṛṣṇānusaraṇām |
amandaṃ kandarpajvarajanitacintākulatayā valadbādhāṃ rādhāṃ sarasamidamūce sahacarī ||

lalitalavaṅgalatāpariśīlanakomalamalayasamīre |
madhukaranikarakarambitakokilakūjitakuñjakuṭīre ||

unmadamadanamanorathapathikavadhūjanajanitavilāpe |
alikulasaṅkulakusumasamūhanirākulabakulakalāpe ||

vācaḥ pallavayatyumāpatidharaḥ saṃdarbhaśuddhiṃ girāṃ jānīte jayadeva eva śaraṇaḥ ślāghyo durūhadrute |
śṛṅgārottarasatprameyaracanairācāryagovardhanaspardhī ko 'pi na viśrutaḥ śrutidharo dhoyī kavikṣmāpatiḥ ||

mādhavikāparimalalalite navamālatijātisugandhau |
munimanasām api mohanakārīṇi taruṇākāraṇabandhau ||

sphuradatimuktalatāparirambhanamukulitapulakitacūte |
vṛndāvanavipine parisaraparigatayamunājalapūte ||

śrījayadevabhaṇitamidamudayati haricaraṇasmṛtisāram |
sarasavasantasamayavanavarṇanamanugatamadanavikāram ||

anekanārīparirambhasaṃbhramasphuranmanohārivilāsalālasam |
murārimārādupadarśayantyasau sakhī samakṣaṃ punarāha rādhikām ||

candanacarcitanīlakalevarapītavasanavanamālī |
kelicalanmaṇikuṇḍalamaṇḍitagaṇḍayugasmitaśālī ||

yadi harismaraṇe sarasaṃ mano yadi vilāsakalāsu kutūhalam |
madhurakomalakāntapadāvalīṃ śṛṇu tadā jayadevasarasvatīm ||

pīnapayodharabhārabhareṇa hariṃ parirabhya sarāgam |
gopavadhūranugāyati kācidudañcitapañcamarāgam ||

kāpi kapolatale militā lapituṃ kimapi śrutimūle |
cāru cucumba nitambavatī dayitaṃ pulakairanukūle ||

kelikalākutukena ca kācidamuṃ yamunājalakūle |
mañjulavañjulakuñjagataṃ vicakarṣa kareṇa dukūle ||

karatalatālataralavalayāvalikalitakalasvanavaṃśe |
rāsarase sahanṛtyaparā hariṇā yuvatiḥ praśaśaṃse ||

śliṣyati kāmapi cumbati kāmapi kāmapi ramayati rāmām |
paśyati sasmitacārutarāmaparāmanugacchati vāmām ||

śrījayadevabhaṇitamidamadbhutakeśavakelirahasyam |
vṛndāvanavipine lalitaṃ vitanotu śubhāni yaśasyam ||

adyotsaṅgavasadbhujaṅgakavalakleśādiveśācalaṃ prāleyaplavanecchayānusarati śrīkhaṇḍaśailānilaḥ |
kiṃ ca snigdharasālamaulimukulānyālokya harṣodayādunmīlanti kuhūḥ kuhūriti kalottālāḥ pikānāṃ giraḥ ||

rāsollāsabhareṇa vibhramabhṛtāmābhīravāmabhruvāmabhyarṇaṃ parirabhya nirbharamuraḥ premāndhayā rādhayā |
sādhu tvadvadanaṃ sudhāmayam iti vyāhṛtya gītastutivyājādudbhaṭacumbitaḥ smitamanohārī hariḥ pātu vaḥ ||

pralayapayodhijale dhṛtavān asi vedaṃ
vihitavahitracaritramakhedam |
keśava dhṛtamīnaśarīra jaya jagadīśa hare ||

kṣitirativipulatare tava tiṣṭhati pṛṣṭhe dharaṇidharaṇakiṇacakragariṣṭhe |
keśava dhṛtakacchaparūpa jaya jagadīśa hare ||

chalayasi vikramaṇe balimadbhutavāmana padanakhanīrajanitajanapāvana |
keśava dhṛtavāmanarūpa jaya jagadīśa hare ||

viharati vane rādhā sādhāraṇapraṇaye harau vigalitanijotkarṣādīrṣyāvaśena gatānyataḥ |
kvacidapi latākuñje guñjanmadhuvratamaṇḍalī mukharaśikhare līna dīnāpyuvāca rahaḥ sakhīm ||

gaṇayati guṇagrāmaṃ bhrāmaṃ bhramādapi nehate vahati ca paritoṣaṃ doṣaṃ vimuñcati dūrataḥ |
yuvatiṣu valattṛṣṇe kṛṣṇe vihāriṇi māṃ vinā punarapi mano vāmaṃ kāmaṃ karoti karomi kim ||

nibhṛtanikuñjagṛhaṃ gatayā niśi rahasi nilīya vasantaṃ cakitavilokitasakaladiśā ratirabhasavaśena hasantam || 
sakhi he keśimathanamudāram ramaya mayā saha madanamanorathabhāvitayā savikāram ||

prathamasamāgamalajjitayā paṭucāṭuśatairanukūlam |
mṛdumadhurasmitabhāṣitayā śithilīkṛtajaghanadukūlam ||

kīsalayaśayananiveśitayā ciramurasi mamaiva śayānam |
kṛtaparirambhaṇacumbanayā parirabhya kṛtādharapānam ||

alasanimīlitalocanayā pulakāvalilalitakapolam |
śramajalasakalakalevarayā varamadanamadādatilolam ||

kokilakalaravakūjitayā jitamanasijatantravicāram |
ślathakusumākulakuntalayā nakhalikhitaghanastanabhāram ||

caraṇaraṇitamaṇinūpurayā paripūritasuratavitānam |
mukharaviśṛṅkhalamekhalayā sakacagrahacumbanadānam ||

śrījayadevabhaṇitamidamatiśayamadhuripunidhuvanaśīlam |
sukhamutkaṇṭhitagopavadhūkathitaṃ vitanotu salīlaṃ ||

saṃcaradadharasudhāmadhuradhvanimukharitamohanavaṃśam |
calitadṛgañcalacañcalamaulikapolavilolavataṃsam |
rāse harimiha vihitavilāsaṃ smarati mano mama kṛtaparihāsam ||

durālokastokastavakanavakāśokalatikāvikāśaḥ kāsāropavanapavano 'pi vyathayati |
api bhrāmyadbhṛṅgīraṇitaramaṇīyā na mukulaprasūtiścūtānāṃ sakhi śikhariṇīyaṃ sukhayati ||

maṇimayamakaramanoharakuṇḍalamaṇḍitagaṇḍamudāram |
pītavasanamanugatamunimanujasurāsuravaraparivāram ||

viśadakadambatale militaṃ kalikaluṣabhayaṃ śamayantam |
māmapi kimapi taralataraṅgadanaṅgadṛśā manasā ramayantam ||

śrījayadevabhaṇitamatisundaramohanamadhuripurūpam |
haricaraṇasmaraṇaṃ prati samprati puṇyavatāmanurūpam ||

itastatastāmanusṛtya rādhikāmanaṅgabāṇavraṇakhinnamānasaḥ |
kṛtānutāpaḥ sa kalindanandinītaṭāntakuñje viṣasāda mādhavaḥ ||

māmiyaṃ calitā vilokya vṛtaṃ vadhūnicayena sāparādhatayā mayāpi na vāritātibhayena |
hari hari hatādaratayā gatā sā kupiteva ||

kiṃ kariṣyati kiṃ vadiṣyati sā ciraṃ viraheṇa |
kiṃ janena dhanena kiṃ mama jīvitena gṛheṇa ||

tāmahaṃ hṛdi saṅgatāmaniśaṃ bhṛśaṃ ramayāmi |
kiṃ vane 'nusarāmi tāmiha kiṃ vṛthā vilapāmi ||

tanvi khinnamasūyayā hṛdayaṃ tavākalayāmi |
tanna vedmi kuto gatāsi na tena te 'nunayāmi ||

dṛśyase purato gatāgatameva me vidadhāsi |
kiṃ pureva sasaṃbhramaṃ parirambhaṇaṃ na dadāsi ||

kṣamyatāmaparaṃ kadāpi tavedṛśaṃ na karomi |
dehi sundari darśanaṃ mama manmathena dunomi ||

yamunātīravānīranikuñje mandamāsthitaṃ |
prāha premabharodbhrāntaṃ mādhavaṃ rādhikāsakhī ||

harir iti harir iti japati sakāmam |
virahavihitamaraṇeva nikāmaṃ ||

śrījayadevabhaṇitam iti gītam |
sukhayatu keśavapadam upanītam ||

dhyāna-layena puraḥ parikalpya bhavantamatīva durāpam |
vilapati hasati viṣīdati roditi cañcati muñcati tāpam ||

śrījayadevabhaṇitamidamadhikaṃ yadi manasā naṭaṇīyam |
harivirahākulaballavayuvatisakhīvacanaṃ paṭhanīyam ||

taiḥ śarīraṃ ca kāvyānāmalaṃkārāśca darśitāḥ |
śarīraṃ tāvadiṣṭārthavyavacchinnā padāvalī ||

padyaṃ gadyaṃ ca miśraṃ ca tat tridhaiva vyavasthitam |
padyaṃ catuṣpadī tacca vṛttaṃ jātiriti dvidhā ||

muktakaṃ kulakaṃ kośaḥ saṃghāta iti tādṛśaḥ |
sargabandhāṃśarūpatvādanuktaḥ padyavistaraḥ ||

sargabandho mahākāvyamucyate tasya lakṣaṇam |
āśīrnamaskriyā vastunirdeśo vāpi tanmukham ||

itihāsakathodbhūtamitaradvā sadāśrayam /
caturvargaphalāyattaṃ caturodāttanāyakam // 1.15 //

nagarārṇavaśailartucandrārkodayavarṇanaiḥ |
udyānasalilakrīḍāmadhupānaratotsavaiḥ ||

vipralambhairvivāhaiśca kumārodayavarṇanaiḥ |
mantradūtaprayāṇājināyakābhyudayairapi ||

alaṃkṛtamasaṃkṣiptaṃ rasabhāvanirantaram |
sargairanativistīrṇaiḥ śravyavṛttaiḥ susaṃdhibhiḥ ||

sarvatra bhinnavṛttāntairupetaṃ lokarañjanam |
kāvyaṃ kalpottarasthāyi jāyate sadalaṃkṛti ||

pūrvaśāstrāṇi saṃhṛtya prayogānupalakṣya ca |
yathāsāmarthyamasmābhiḥ kriyate kāvyalakṣaṇam ||

nyūnamapyatra yaiḥkaiścidaṅgaiḥ kāvyaṃ na duṣyati |
yadyupātteṣu saṃpattirārādhayati tadvidaḥ ||

guṇataḥ prāg upanyasya nāyakaṃ tena vidviṣām |
nirākaraṇam ity eṣa mārgaḥ prakṛtisundaraḥ ||

vaṃśavīryaśrutādīni varṇayitvā riporapi |
tajjayānnāyakotkarṣakathanaṃ ca dhinoti naḥ ||

apādaḥ padasaṃtāno gadyamākhyāyikākathā |
iti tasya prabhedau dvau tayorākhyāyikā kila ||

nāyakenaiva vācyānyā nāyakenetareṇa vā |
svaguṇāviṣkriyā doṣo nātra bhūtārthaśaṃsinaḥ ||

api tvaniyamo dṛṣṭas tatrāpyanyairudīraṇāt |
anyo vaktā svayaṃ veti kīdṛgvā bhedalakṣaṇam ||

vaktraṃ cāparavaktraṃ ca socchvāsatvaṃ ca bhedakam |
cihnamākhyāyikāyāścet prasaṅgena kathāsvapi ||

āryādivatpraveśaḥ kiṃ na vaktrāparavaktrayoḥ |
bhedaśca dṛṣṭo lambādirucchvāso vāstu kiṃ tataḥ ||

tat kathākhyāyiketyekā jātiḥ saṃjñādvayāṅkitā |
atraivāntarbhaviṣyanti śeṣāścākhyānajātayaḥ ||

kanyāharaṇasaṃgrāmavipralambhodayādayaḥ |
sargabandhasamā eva naite vaiśeṣikā guṇāḥ ||

iha śiṣṭānuśiṣṭānāṃ śiṣṭānāmapi sarvathā |
vācāmeva prasādena lokayātrā pravartate ||

kavibhāvakṛtaṃ cihnamanyatrāpi na duṣyati |
mukhamiṣṭārthasaṃsiddhyai kiṃ hi na syāt kṛtātmanām ||

miśrāṇi nāṭakādīni teṣāmanyatra vistaraḥ |
gadyapadyamayī kācitcampūrityabhidhīyate ||

tadetadvāṅmayaṃ bhūyaḥ saṃskṛtaṃ prākṛtaṃ tathā |
apabhraṃśaśca miśraṃ cetyāhurāryāścaturvidham ||

saṃskṛtaṃ nāma daivī vāganvākhyātā maharṣibhiḥ |
tadbhavastatsamo deśītyanekaḥ prākṛtakramaḥ ||

śaurasenī ca gauḍī ca lāṭī cānyā ca tādṛśī |
yāti prākṛtamityevaṃ vyavahāreṣu saṃnidhim ||

ābhīrādigiraḥ kāvyeṣvapabhraṃśa iti smṛtāḥ |
śāstreṣu saṃskṛtādanyadapabhraṃśatayoditam ||

saṃskṛtaṃ sargabandhādi prākṛtaṃ skandhakādikam |
osarādīnyapabhraṃśo nāṭakādi tu miśrakam ||

kathāpi sarvabhāṣābhiḥ saṃskṛtena ca badhyate |
bhūtabhāṣāmayīṃ prāhuradbhutārthāṃ bṛhatkathām ||

lāsyacchalitaśamyādi prekṣārthamitarat punaḥ |
śravyameveti saiṣāpi dvayī gatirudāhṛtā ||

idamandhaṃ tamaḥ kṛtsnaṃ jāyeta bhuvanatrayam |
yadi śabdāhvayaṃ jyotirāsaṃsāranna dīpyate ||

astyaneko girāṃ mārgaḥ sūkṣmabhedaḥ parasparam |
tatra vaidarbhagauḍīyau varṇyete prasphuṭāntarau ||

śleṣaḥ prasādaḥ samatā mādhuryaṃ sukumāratā |
arthavyaktirudāratvaṃ ojaḥkāntisamādhayaḥ ||

iti vaidarbhamārgasya prāṇā daśa guṇāḥ smṛtāḥ |
eṣāṃ viparyayaḥ prāyo lakṣyate gauḍavartmani ||

śliṣṭam aspṛṣṭaśaithilyam alpaprāṇākṣarottaram |
śithilaṃ mālatīmālā lolālikalilā yathā ||

anuprāsadhiyā gauḍaistadiṣṭaṃ bandhagauravāt |
vaidarbhairmālatīdāma laṅghitaṃ bhramarairiti ||

samaṃ bandheṣvaviṣamaṃ te mṛdusphuṭamadhyamāḥ |
bandhā mṛdusphuṭonmiśravarṇavinyāsayonayaḥ ||

kokilālāpavācālo māmeti malayānilaḥ |
ucchalacchīkarācchācchanirjharāmbhaḥkaṇokṣitaḥ ||

candanapraṇayodgandhirmando malayamārutaḥ |
spardhate ruddhamaddhairyo vararāmāmukhānilaiḥ ||

ity anālocya vaiṣamyam arthālaṃkāraḍambarau |
apekṣamāṇā vavṛdhe paurastyā kāvyapaddhatiḥ ||

guṇadoṣānaśāstrajñaḥ kathaṃ vibhajate naraḥ |
kimandhasyādhikāro 'sti rūpabhedopalabdhiṣu ||

ataḥ prajānāṃ vyutpattimabhisaṃdhāya sūrayaḥ |
vācāṃ vicitramārgāṇāṃ nibabandhuḥ kriyāvidhim ||

vākyārtheṇaiva vākyārthaḥ ko 'pi yady upamīyate |
ekānekevaśabdatvāt sā vākyārthopamā dvidhā ||

vastu kiṃcid upanyasya nyasanāt tatsadharmaṇaḥ |
sāmyapratītir astīti prativastūpamā yathā ||

adhikena samīkṛtya hīnamekakriyāvidhau |
yad bruvanti smṛtā seyaṃ tulyayogopamā yathā ||

na liṅgavacane bhinne na hīnādhikatāpi vā |
upamādūṣanāyālaṃ yatrodvego na dhīmatām ||

ity evam ādau saubhāgyaṃ na jahāty eva jātucit |
asty eva kvacid udvegaḥ prayoge vāgvidāṃ yathā ||

īdṛśaṃ varjyate sadbhiḥ kāraṇaṃ tatra cintyatām |
guṇadoṣavicārāya svayam eva manīṣibhiḥ ||

ivavadvāyathāśabdāḥ samānanibhasaṃnibhāḥ |
tulyasaṃkāśanikāśaprakāśapratirūpakāḥ ||

viśeṣaṇasamagrasya rūpaṃ ketor yadīdṛśam |
pāde tadarpaṇād etat saviśeṣaṇarūpakam ||

śliṣṭamiṣṭamanekārthamekarūpānvitaṃ vacaḥ |
tadabhinnapadaṃ bhinnapadaprāyamiti dvidhā ||

upamārūpakākṣepavyatirekādigocarāḥ |
prāgeva darśitāh śleṣā darśyante kecanāpare ||

astyabhinnakriyaḥ kaścidaviruddhakriyo 'paraḥ |
viruddhakarmā cāstyanyaḥ śleṣo niyamavānapi ||

niyamākṣeparūpoktiravirodhī virodhyapi |
teṣāṃ nidarśaneṣveva rūpavyaktirbhaviṣyati ||

madhurā rāgavardhinyaḥ komalāḥ kokilāgiraḥ |
ākarṇyante madakalāḥ śliṣyante cāsitekṣaṇāḥ ||

rāgam ādarśayannepa vāruṇīyogavardhitam |
parābhavati gharmāśur aṅgajas tu vijṛmbhate ||

nistriṃśatvamasāveva dhanuṣyevāsya vakratā |
śareṣveva narendrasya mārgaṇatvaṃ ca vartate ||

mahībhṛdbhūrikaṭakastejasvī niyatodayaḥ |
dakṣaḥ prajāpatiścāsīt svāmī śaktidharaśca saḥ ||

acyuto 'pyavṛṣocchedī rājāpyaviditakṣayaḥ |
devo 'pyavibudho jajñe śaṅkaro 'pyabhūjaṅgavān ||

atha mālyavataḥ prasthe kākutsthasya viyoginaḥ |
durnivārāśrusaṃvego jagāma jaladāgamaḥ ||

yadārdraviraho rāmaḥ prāpitaḥ prāṇasaṃśayam |
nūnaṃ tenānutāpena jagmurjaladarājayaḥ ||

tasya cakruścamatkāraṃ vyatītasamayā api |
smṛtārdramukulodbhedāḥ kadambavanarājayaḥ ||

abravīdatha kālajñastatkālapratipattaye |
praṇamya lakṣmaṇo rāmaṃ rāmāvirahaniḥsaham ||

ucchrayaṃ tīrataravo raverūrjamabhīṣavaḥ |
madaṃ gopatayo gṛhṇantyabhiyogaṃ jigīṣavaḥ ||

prasīda dīyatāṃ karṇaḥ kūjadbhiḥ kurarairamī | 
prārthayantīva saṃcāraṃ taṭāḥ kardamadurgatāḥ ||

bhuvi bhāsvadabhīṣūṇāṃ tvadiṣūṇāśca śatruṣu | 
ayaṃ sampatituṃ kālaḥ sa duṣkālo 'tivāhitaḥ ||

jalajānāṃ sumanasāṃ vayasāṃ jalasevinām |
adya pratijalādhāraṃ sāmagryamavalokyate ||

yuyutsārabhasotkhātasaritpātukarodhasaḥ |
kakudmanto madakalāḥ kalayanti jagantyadhaḥ ||

viśveśa kuru viśvāsamāvartante na te ghanāḥ |
amī śyāmalayantyāśāḥ śukāḥ śālivanonmukhāḥ ||

kāryadiggṛhyatāṃ kā 'pi kimārya sthīyate vṛthā |
evamevāyamasmākamiṣo 'pi kimapaiṣyati ||

vijayāya bhavāsīno mayyarpitavapurbharaḥ |
mūrcchānuvalanavyastaḥ prastarastyajyatāmayam ||

pratīṣṭopatyakāsāladalāgrajalabindavaḥ |
sāryantāṃ kṣaṇamuddhūya sthagitāṃsataṭā jaṭāḥ ||

muhūrtaṃ kriyatāmārya kapolavirahī karaḥ |
vyuṣito valkalagranthiraṃsādunmucyatāmayam ||

ito vitatya dīyantāmiṣavaḥ klinnapatriṇaḥ |
nirmuktārdrajaraccolamādattāmāyataṃ dhanuḥ ||

ito 'vatīryatāṃ prāsthādasvāsthyamidamujjhyatām |
jahīṣubhirdaśagrīvaṃ daśadigvedhaśodhitaiḥ ||

ṛjurādīyatāṃ panthāḥ kāryaguṃphaḥ garīyasī |
utsāryatāmidaṃ dūraṃ tamaḥ kiṃkāryatāmayam ||

āryāyāḥ śivamevāsti śatrurnihata eva te |
alaṃ dattvā 'vasādāya trailokyaśaraṇaṃ vapuḥ ||

rākṣasāpaśadaḥ ko 'sau tvayi sajyaśarāsane |
anena te 'vasādena dūramāropitaḥ punaḥ ||

aśruvegaiḥ pramīlābhirvilāpairakhilaḥ sa te |
āmṛṣṭadehayātrasya māsaḥ prauṣṭhapado gataḥ ||

kriyatāmadhunotsāhaścintyatāṃ nidhanaṃ dviṣaḥ |
kaḥ svabāhusahāyānāṃ mahatāmātmanigrahaḥ ||

prasīda kuru bhūyo 'pi dehayātrāṃ yathā tathā |
anullaṅghitavijñaptirlakṣmaṇo 'varajeṣu te ||

agādhaṃ dhairyamāryasya triṣu lokeṣu gīyate |
janamātrocitaḥ ko 'yamākalpakaparigrahaḥ ||

svakṛtyabhārasannyāsī yāvaditthaṃ viṣīdasi | 
tāvadantakadaṃṣṭrāṇāmarātiratithirna te ||

ātatāyī sa vijñāto jīvatyāryeti ca śrutam |
prāpto yātrāsahaḥ kālaḥ kālakṣepasya ko guṇaḥ ||

na jñāyate paraṃ vyaktamarermāyāvinaḥ padam |
tanmārgaṇaṃ ca suhṛdā sugrīveṇa pratiśrutam ||

diṅmukhāhūtavikhyātakapiyūthaḥ kapīśvaraḥ |
kṣaṇānnūnamasavāryapādamūle patiṣyati ||

aho dīptiraho kāntiraho śīlamaho balam |
aho śaktiraho bhaktiraho prajñā hanūmataḥ ||

pragalbhenāpramattena tenābhyantaramantriṇā |
nūnamasmatkṛte svaptuṃ sugrīvāya na dīyate ||

sa ca pratyupakārāya tvarayatyenamādṛtaḥ |
dhruvaṃ buddhivayovṛddhaḥ sacivo jāmbavānapi ||

tadevaṃ hetunā kena vānarendro vilambate | 
nāsau kṛtaghnasya bhavedguṇavadbhṛtyasaṃgrahaḥ ||

āgantavyaṃ dhruvaṃ tena mārgitāryā pravṛttinā |
prapannaparakṛtyānāmatyuṣṇo hi samudyamaḥ ||

prapede punarudbhedaḥ sūcīnāṃ kacchaketakaiḥ |
upakriyāyāḥ sadṛśaṃ nārebhe ravisūnunā ||

ākṛṣṭamālatīgandhaḥ siṣeve rāghavaṃ marut |
ānītamaithilīvārtastamārtaṃ na tu mārutiḥ ||

śaśāma vṛṣṭyāpi vinā davāgnirāsīdviśeṣātphalapuṣpavṛddhiḥ |
ūnaṃ na sattveṣvadhiko babādhe tasminvanaṃ goptari gāhamāne ||

mithunam parikalpitam tvayā sahakāraḥ phalinī ca nanvimau |
avidhāya vivāhasatkriyāmanayorgamyata ityasāṁpratam ||

kusumam kṛtadohadastvayā yadaśoko'yamudīrayiṣyati|
alakābharaṇam katham nu tattava neṣyāmi nivāpamālyatām ||

dhṛtirastamitā ratiścyutā viratam geyamṛturnirutsavaḥ|
gatamābharaṇaprayojanam pariśūnyam śayanīyamadya me ||

kusumajanma tato navapallavāstadanu ṣaṭpadakokilakūjitam |
iti yathākramam āvirabhūn madhur drumavatīm avatīrya vanasthalīm ||

tyajata mānamalaṃ bata bigrahairna punareti gataṃ caturaṃ vayaḥ |
parabhṛtābhiritīva nivedite smaramate ramate sma vadhūjanaḥ ||

uttiṣṭha dūti yāmo yāmo yātas tathāpi nāyātaḥ |
yātaḥ paramapi tiṣṭhejjīvitanāśo bhavet tasyāḥ ||

diviṣado viṣadoṣajidauṣadhīmadhurasānurasānugatadrumam |
taruṇavāraṇavāramadacchaṭānadhamagandhamagaṃ dadṛśustataḥ ||

kvacana kāñcanaketakaketanaṃ kvacana bālatamālasamākulam |
kvacana kinnaragānamanoramaṃ kvacana nirjharapātapavitritam ||

tuhinavāhi navāśmasamuccayaṃ ghanalatānalatālanirantaram |
niraghasāraghasāraṇipicchilaṃ purucamūrucamūruciraśriyam ||

sabakaśāvakaśākhiśataṃ priyāsahitarohitarohitaśambaram |
asamahaṃsamahaṃ dadhataṃ saroruhasamūḍhasamūḍhamadaṃ saraḥ ||

viśadatoyadatoyahatānalaṃ saninadātinadātimanoharam |
tagarasālarasālamṛducchadaprasavarājivarājirakandaram ||

capalayā kalitaṃ kapimālayā capalayālirutastutasaṃpadam |
gajavatā vipinena vṛtaṃ manāgajavatāspadamārutaśālinā ||

savanarājitaḍāgraṃ mahāsarasavanarājitadehayativrajam |
paraśubhāsanarāmaniṣevitaṃ paraśubhāsanatīrthaparaṃparam ||

pavanadevanadevanagasphuranmadhukarālikarālitapañkajam |
vividhavapradhavapratipāditābhinavapuṣpavapuṣpaṭaveṣṭitam ||

śabaratāḍitamattamataṅgajaṃ śavaratākhilapheravabhairavam |
samarasīmagatoddhurakāsaraṃ samarasīkṛtacittatapodhanam ||

jayati sukharāja ekaḥ kāraṇarahitaḥ sadodito jagatām |
yasya ca nigadanasamaye vacanadaridro babhūva sarvajñaḥ ||

guruvaracaraṇacirātiśayabhaktyādeśaviśeṣaḥ |
svasmṛtaye likhito ’tra mayā ko budhajanavidveṣaḥ ||
asminnadvaye prakṛtipariśuddhe sahajāvasthayaivātmanaivātmānaṃ puṃstrīrūpamabhinirmāya tadarthapratipattaye svakameva rūpaṃ svarūpeṣu sraṣṭā vyaktabhāvānugatatattvamiha darśayati |
ato ’py atyantābhyāsasukhakriyāvibodhitopabhogagahanasuratasukhasaṃvardhanaprakṛtijanito ’tīndriyaḥ svapratipattigocaraḥ saṃsārasārasukharāśir jāto ’bhūd iti |

yadidaṃ sanimittasukhaṃ tadeva jagatāṃ nimittaparihīṇam |
jñānasvayaṃbhurūpaṃ mahāsukhaṃ kalpanāśūnyam ||

asāvanu vedanātiniyatapratyāsattyaiva sarvavyāpi sarvagato ’ticapalamahābhūtamānasasanniyuktasvaprādeśikī satī bāhyapañcendriyagrāmamandragamyamānā kalpitabahirgatarūpādigrāhyagrāhakabhāvābhibhūya mānamohamātsaryabhayaśokerṣyāghṛṇādayātṛṣṇeṣṭāniṣṭādikairghasmarataraṃ saṃsāracakramanuvāhinī bhavatīti |
